entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
